#### Research Updates:

**January 2022:** I am here at UC Riverside to work on projects related to the bee gut microbiome with [Dr. Quinn McFrederick](https://melittology.ucr.edu/). I have already learned so much already and am looking forward to seeing what we find! <br>

<center> <img src="images/ucr.JPG" width="32%"> <img src="images/riverside_mt.JPG" width="35%"> </center> <br>

Also, our paper about how sunflower affects a gut pathogen in multiple bumble bee species has been accepted for publication in *Proceedings of the Royal Society B*!

**November 2021:** Our paper about how sunflower affects the bumble bee immune system has been accepted for publication as part of a special issue in *Philosophical Transactions B*! The issue will be out in March 2022.
